fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target is an NK, NG, or REF, you'll learn their faction. You'll learn their role if they're NK or NG.
- If your target is detection immune, a factional (Head), or not listed above, you'll find them "not suspicious".
- If your target is framed, they show up as whatever their framer's role is.
- Douses cannot and will not affect your result under any circumstances now shut the hell up.
